solution_line_template: The second day Richard walks {first_day_miles}/2-{less_miles} = <<{first_day_miles}/2-{less_miles}={second_day_miles}>>{second_day_miles} miles.
Richard has {total_distance}-{total_miles_walked} = <<{total_distance}-{total_miles_walked}={remaining_miles}>>{remaining_miles} miles further to walk to be in New York City.
